wapptmpls_description: This command will open layout with template choose and telephone number enter.
d360-api-key-setting-description: Input D360Dialog API KEY here if you know it, if not generate it on https://hub.360dialog.com
languageCode-setting-description: Enter the language code to sort the templates
department-setting-description: The setting is specified for sending incoming messages to the department queue.
department-placeholder: Write here department id or name
welcome-message-setting-description: The message is automatically sent when new conversations are created.
finish-message-setting-description: The message is automatically sent when the conversation is closed.
finish-message-placeholder: Write a message here at the end of the conversation
agent-signature-setting-description: Configure the type of display of the agent's name when sending messages.
